name: @cohey0727/react-use-proxy-state
description: `useProxyState` is a custom React hook that utilizes JavaScript Proxies to enable state management with automatic component re-rendering upon state mutation. This hook simplifies state management in React components by creating a proxy around the state object, allowing direct mutations while still triggering component updates.
author: Kohei Okamoto <ohayousagi.ac.kook0727@gmail.com>
